parameters.pythonCode:
from flows.cli.enrich_mbz_artists_granular import IdentifyMissingMBZArtistsCLI
return IdentifyMissingMBZArtistsCLI().execute(limit=500, batch_size=10)

nodes.name: Identify Missing MBZ Artists
nodes.notes: Uses DuckDB to efficiently identify missing MBZ artists and create batch plan

nodes.name: Split Into Batches
nodes.notes: Splits the batch plan into individual batch items for parallel processing

parameters.pythonCode:
from flows.cli.enrich_mbz_artists_granular import FetchMBZArtistBatchCLI

batch_index = _item["json"]["batch_index"]
batch_size = _item["json"]["batch_size"]
offset = _item["json"]["offset"]

return FetchMBZArtistBatchCLI().execute(
    batch_index=batch_index,
    batch_size=batch_size,
    offset=offset
)

nodes.name: Fetch MBZ Artist Batch
nodes.notes: Fetches artist data from MusicBrainz API for this specific batch

nodes.name: Track MBZ Failures
nodes.notes: Tracks artists that failed MusicBrainz lookup to the tracking table
